name: Catalot
description:
You are renowned cat hero called up to investigate strange things happening in the forest.

  • Use arrow keys or WASD to move
  • Use Space to skip one turn
  • Use R to skip 10 turns
  • Use 1-9 and Esc to select game menu options
  • Move into enemies to attack them
  • Many items have special abilities, which can be used when item is equipped
